In January and February 2024, R-Ladies Ottawa hosted a 3-part Introduction to R workshop series.

![](images/workshop_series.png)

You can find the materials from the workshops below:

2. Data Visualization I [[Event](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-ottawa/events/298042652/)] [[Recording](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lFjjD0EEWX0&pp=ygUNcmVpa28gb2thbW90bw%3D%3D)] [[Code](https://github.com/RLadies-Ottawa/2024-02-01_ggplot2-part-01)]

3. Data Visualization II [[Event](https://www.meetup.com/rladies-ottawa/events/298042671/)] [[Recording](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ieLQQgYVO_s)] [[Code](https://github.com/RLadies-Ottawa/2024-02-22_ggplot2-part-02)]
